measurements.description:
Two flowers of beautiful translucent color on two 9.5 cm inflorescences well held above foliage of pleasing proportions
	on a plant 18 cm wide in a 5 cm plastic pot; leaves very thick, almost coriaceous, 8.3 cm long and 2.7 cm wide;
	dorsal sepal translucent white, faintly blushed yellow, veined opaque white; lateral sepals translucent white, veined 
	opaque white; caudae chartreuse, 7.1 cm in length; petals purple, minute; lip white, purple distally; substance firm; texture matte.
